notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: M.d.J.R.-A., R.P.-S., J.R.-R., J.B.-G., C.T.-A, and S.C. conceived and designed the experiments; M.d.J.R.-A., J.R.-R., J.B.-G., C.T.-A., and S.C. performed the experiments; M.d.J.R.-A., R.P.-S., J.R.-R., J.B.-G., C.T.-A., and S.C. analyzed the data; M.d.J.R.-A., R.P.-S., J.R.-R., J.B.-G., C.T.-A., and S.C. contributed with reagents/plant materials/analysis tools; and M.d.J.R.-A., J.R.-R., J.B.-G., C.T.-A., and S.C. were involved in drafting the manuscript or revising it. All authors have approved the final version.
